item.description:
We will continue with Locke's Essay, Book 2. More exactly the first part of Book 2 from chapter 1 through (including) chapter 21 (Of Power). This with the notes to chapter 21 is a bit longer than half of Book 2 and more than we usually choose to read, but this time is one of those times of the year when we have 3 weeks between meetings. (We meet the second and forth Thursdays of each month.)

Rendang is still closed so we will continue to meet at the Bombay Club.
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask about us (philosophy group) from the staff.
item.name: Locke: An Essay Concerning Human Understanding II
